title: Strengthening Clinical Practical Competencies: Data-Driven Personalized Instruction for MOOC Learning Outcomes Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Mathematical Concepts and Online Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze learning engagement data collected from MOOC platforms to explain differences between performance groups.
Learners can propose effective VR learning simulation designs by analyzing time management and content access patterns.
Learners can present customized task design plans for different learner levels based on data-driven insights.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
